Welcome to the documentation for Paint by Jon Bayert.

Visit the Github

Package Paint

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    getCallback
    This is used with the logger.
    OnTick
    This interface is used to pass a button
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutPaintController
    This loads the fxml file AboutPaint and displays the version number and release date
    AutoSaveClass
    This class manages the autosave prompt.
    AutoSaveTask
    Creates a timer for the auto save.
    ClosePrompt
    This shows the prompt for if the file should be saved
    ColorChooserClass
    manages the color/ width chooser has getters and setters for the color pickers
    FileExplorerClass
    Creates a prompt to allow the user to save/saveAs/open a file
    helpMenuController
    adds the text to the help menu
    HotkeysClass
    Manages when the hotkeys are pressed
    ImageEditor
    Adds a tab to the image editor
    LoggerPaint
    Creates a timer for the auto save.
    PaintMain
    The main application
    PrimaryController
    The main fxml controller handles user inputs nd the choosing of buttons
    ResizeClass
    This class manages the prompt to resize the files
    ShapePane
    manages the open image and the drawing of the shape
    ToolBarButton
    creates a button for the tooltip
    ToolMenuClass
    The tool menu so that only one is pressed
    ToolMenuInputsRow
    prompts the input for selected row.
    ZoomableScrollPane
    allows a pane to be scrolled with the zoom wheel
